name: Md. Ariful Islam
text: The Asus ProArt Studiobook 16 is an impressive laptop made with content creators in mind, from its versatile input dial and 4K OLED screen to its high-flying AMD and Nvidia components.

name: Md. Tarikul Islam
text: It could stand a price cut, but the 14-inch, 2.3-pound Asus Chromebook CX9 is the very model of a capable business Chromebook.

name: Likhon
text: The Zephyrus S17 is a highly capable 17.3-inch gaming machine with exotic touches and a supercar price.

name: Sommiddho Ayat
text: The Asus VivoBook 17 M712 offers enough AMD Ryzen-based muscle to make light of simple tasks, and its 17-inch screen and stylish silver chassis belie a very attractive price

name: Ahonaf Taomid
text: The Asus Chromebook Detachable CM3 is a capable 10-inch tablet with an included keyboard and cover. If only the build quality matched the asking price.

name: Md. Shariful Islam
text: The business-focused Asus ExpertBook B9450CEA is a trim and light laptop with some pep in its step, plus nice hardware and software extras.
